friends
eyeorb.net
My closest friend, and an extremely talented webdeveloper; I can't laud this webpage with enough praise. Every page is unique from one another, whilst still maintaining a consistent (in my opinion beautiful) gradient-heavy style. If you're at all interested in looking at a website unique from what you usually see, go here.
moosyu.com
All around cool guy; even if he has a tendency to rack up infractions within the Nekoweb community. His site goes through something of an identity crisis semi-frequently, but I find his reviews and blog posts to be quite interesting. Feel free to spam his guestbook on my behalf.
jhorn.net
I haven't known him for all that long, but we mysteriously seem to share the exact same thoughts on every subject. This website has an extremely unique, yet still highly legible style, and it's just fun to look through in general. If you're into writings from the indie web whatsoever, I highly recommend checking my man jhorn out.
lel.nekoweb.org
We're all friends with that one guy who's probably going to get arrested but he's lowkey chill so you still hang out with him; for me that's lel. He's a brilliant webdeveloper even if his current layout is a blatant ripoff of a Discord theme, and I think his blog is interesting in a schizophrenic way.
gator.nekoweb.org
One of the nicest people I know, and also one of the best looking websites I know (even if there's nothing on it ever :graah:). Really nice usage of a frutiger-aero-esque style, which I imagine will be even better once he further fleshes out the site.
rice.place
One of the first people I came to know in the Nekoweb community, and a generally helpful and kind individual. This site is one of the few 'cutesy' sites that I genuinely like, and I think you'll be hard pressed to find a page on this site which doesn't look amazing. At the time of writing this her site is in a hiatus, but I hope for it to return sooner rather than later.
thinliquid.dev
Even if he has the peculiar ability to alternate between amazing and god-awful layouts, he's still a nice guy who's made a lot of tools which I use. Definitely recommend checking out his site to check out his resources (and also if he has a good layout or not on the given day).
